name: Explore Agra
title: Discover the beauty of Taj Mahal and more
description: Agra is home to the iconic Taj Mahal, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and a symbol of eternal love. Don't miss Agra Fort and Fatehpur Sikri.

name: Delhi Adventures
title: Dive into the heart of India's capital
description: Delhi offers a mix of ancient and modern attractions, including Red Fort, India Gate, Lotus Temple, and vibrant street markets like Chandni Chowk.

name: Mumbai Escapades
title: Unveil the magic of the city of dreams
description: Mumbai, the financial capital of India, boasts iconic spots like the Gateway of India, Marine Drive, and Juhu Beach.

name: Gwalior Highlights
title: Explore forts and cultural heritage
description: Gwalior is famous for its majestic Gwalior Fort, intricately designed temples, and historical significance.

name: Mathura Serenity
title: Experience spirituality at its best
description: Mathura, the birthplace of Lord Krishna, is dotted with ancient temples, ghats, and vibrant festivals like Janmashtami.

name: Jaipur Majesty
title: Step into the royal world of the Pink City
description: Jaipur, known for its pink-hued buildings, is home to the Amber Fort, Hawa Mahal, and the opulent City Palace.

name: Chennai Wonders
title: Discover beaches and temples
description: Chennai is renowned for its Marina Beach, Kapaleeshwarar Temple, and rich South Indian culture.

name: Kolkata Essence
title: Experience art, culture, and heritage
description: Kolkata, the cultural capital of India, features the Victoria Memorial, Howrah Bridge, and Durga Puja celebrations.

name: Bangalore Spots
title: Tech hub meets lush greenery
description: Bangalore, known for its IT industry, also offers Lalbagh Botanical Garden and Cubbon Park for nature enthusiasts.

name: Hyderabad Heritage
title: Taste the flavors and visit Charminar
description: Hyderabad blends modernity and tradition with Charminar, Golconda Fort, and delectable Hyderabadi biryani.
